title: RDBMS
text:
RDBMS

The classical and well-established form of a database is a relational database management system (RDBMS).
In devonfw we recommend to use an RDBMS unless you have specific need.
However, in case you have the need for big data, graph-data, BLOB focus, or schema-less dynamic data you can have a look at NoSQL options but be aware that these may be experimental and are not fully supported by devonfw.
